Articles.Content:
Aldfel Kerman accidentally pushed the "arm parachutes" button. Problem: his vessel is still on the moon. Is there an in-game way to reset the chutes so that they dont deploy and burn up during reentry? Or is it possible to tweak the parameters to force a very low semi-deployment at maybe 10km altitude?

I know it is possible to repack chutes after they have been deployed, but this situation is different.

The pressure value determines when the chute will part-deploy, when I do this I turn it up to some arbitrary value and lower it after the reentry heat danger has past.

Edited May 6, 2015 by ghpstage
